sentences.sContent: Some of the nurses would come in knackered after a day on A&E, strip till two in the morning and then go home.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some of the nurses would come in knackered after a day on A&E, strip till two in the morning and then go home.
sentences.sCn: 有些当护士的在医院急诊室里工作了一整天，筋疲力尽地跑到会所跳舞跳到凌晨2点，然后才回家。
